TextEng: There's no replacement for family but you look like a friendly face...
Text: 가족을 대신할 순 없지만 그래도 얼굴이 인자해 보이는군...

TextEng: What is it you need, then? I have worries of my own, you know...
Text: 뭐가 필요한 건데? 나도 걱정이 많다고...

TextEng: Why my children, huh? Why couldn't the Wailing have taken someone like you, instead?
Text: 왜 하필 내 아이들이야? 왜 당신 같은 사람 대신 내 아이들을 데려간 거야?

TextEng: You want some informations? All right, dunce, all you have to do is ask.
Text: 정보가 필요하다고? 좋아, 이 바보야, 그냥 물어보면 돼.

TextEng: I can spare a few moments. Perhaps the idle chatter will clear my thoughts.
Text: 잠깐 얘기할 시간은 있어. 수다라도 떨면 머리가 맑아질지도.

TextEng: I know I don't want to get it. The Wailing took my entire family, one after the other. I watched 'em die, every one - They shriveled up from the inside.
Text: 그 병에 걸리기 싫다는 건 확실해. 울부짖는 죽음이 우리 가족 전부를 하나씩 데려갔어. 다 죽는 걸 봤지 - 속부터 쪼그라들더라고.

TextEng: Bah, won't tell us "simple people." They think we'd panic if there was no hope or stampede if a cure was announced.
Text: 허, 우리 같은 '하층민'한테는 안 알려주지. 희망이 없으면 공포에 빠지고 치료제가 나오면 몰려들 거라 생각하나 봐.

TextEng: Last little while I've heard the place is almost overrun with thieves, too. People seem to really need gold for something.
Text: 요즘 그쪽은 도둑들 천지라고 들었어. 사람들이 금화가 정말 필요한가 봐.

TextEng: I suppose we are both <race>. Ah, all right. I don't know much anyway, so I'm in the clear.
Text: 우리 둘 다 <race>이니까. 아, 알았어. 어차피 아는 것도 별로 없으니까 괜찮겠지.

TextEng: I ain't heard a single thing, and I probably won't. I'm not sure whether it's a blessing or a curse but I'm alive...
Text: 아무것도 못 들었고, 앞으로도 못 들을 거야. 축복인지 저주인지 모르겠지만 난 살아있어...

TextEng: And don't think it's coincidence that the plague seemed to start in the Beggar's Nest, either! The rich needed an excuse to clear it out.
Text: 역병이 거지 소굴에서 시작된 게 우연이라고 생각하지 마! 부자들은 그곳을 정리할 핑계가 필요했던 거야.

TextEng: Would I know the difference? It's just that the eyes go dead long before a person stops moving... That's when the Wailing starts...
Text: 내가 뭘 알겠어? 그냥 멈추기 한참 전에 눈부터 죽어... 그때 울부짖기 시작하지...

TextEng: Maybe those Helmites are right. Maybe it's a wasting of the soul. Maybe the gods are mad at us... My question is how come I survived?
Text: 어쩌면 헬름 사제들 말이 맞을지도. 영혼이 시드는 거라나. 신들이 우리한테 화가 났나... 근데 왜 나만 살아남은 거지?

TextEng: Maybe you heard about that, or maybe you had a part in it? I dunno, but the area seems much more calm... aside from the Wailing, of course.
Text: 혹시 그 일 들었어? 아님 관련이 있나? 모르겠지만 그쪽이 훨씬 조용해졌어... 역병 빼고.

TextEng: I even heard they were trying to hoard food and part of a cure! Someone put a stop to it though.
Text: 음식이랑 치료제 일부를 사재기하려 했다는 말도 들었어! 누군가 막았다더라.

TextEng: I hear things are getting better though. There was some infighting or something, but now it's been settled. Less muggings too.
Text: 상황이 나아지고 있다고 들었어. 내분이 좀 있었는데 이제 해결됐다더라. 강도도 줄었고.

TextEng: Thanks for the distraction from my troubles - I hope your kin don't fall prey the same as mine...
Text: 내 걱정에서 잠시 벗어나게 해줘서 고마워 - 당신 가족은 우리처럼 안 됐으면 좋겠어...

TextEng: Neverwinter... This city was a good place once. Now it's nothing but burning bodies piled in the streets. I don't even have a family anymore.
Text: 네버윈터... 이 도시도 한때는 좋은 곳이었어. 이제는 거리에 불타는 시체가 쌓여있을 뿐이야. 난 이제 가족도 없어.

TextEng: You want to go poking around for stories, go right ahead. I'm going to stay right here: in the street and out of trouble.
Text: 이야기거리 찾고 싶으면 마음대로 해. 난 거리에서 조용히 있을 거야.

TextEng: It's set out like an eye - the City Core, where we are now, is the pupil. Around it lie the other districts... Through it all runs the river, all fed by tears.
Text: 눈 모양이야 - 지금 우리가 있는 도시 중심부가 눈동자고. 주변에 다른 구역들이 있어... 그 사이로 강이 흐르는데, 온통 눈물이지.

TextEng: Do you want to hear about the Beggar's Nest? The Docks? The Blacklake? The Peninsula? The City Core? Take your pick - I have a lifetime, however short.
Text: 거지 소굴? 부두? 검은호수? 반도? 도시 중심부? 뭘 듣고 싶어? 골라 - 시간은 있어, 얼마나 남았을진 모르지만.

TextEng: As if I care about anything else right now. I'm scared to go home, to see the bodies. I'm scared maybe I'll catch it too.
Text: 지금 다른 게 무슨 상관이야. 집에 가기가 무서워, 시체들을 보는 게. 나도 걸릴까 봐 무서워.

TextEng: That would depend on what you are looking for. I suppose I could make my best guess at what you want.
Text: 뭘 찾는지에 따라 다르지. 원하는 게 뭔지 대충 짐작해볼게.

TextEng: You work a bit outside the law, maybe? Don't worry, my lips are sealed. I know somewhere that might interest you, though...
Text: 법 바깥에서 좀 일하나? 걱정 마, 입 다물고 있을게. 관심 가질 만한 곳을 알긴 해...

TextEng: You one of them nature-talking forest-walkers, aren't you? I suppose you might visit the Druid Tree in the City Core upper square east.
Text: 자연과 대화하며 숲을 거니는 부류지? 도시 중심부 북동쪽 광장에 있는 드루이드 나무를 찾아가 봐.

TextEng: You looking for a temple or something? You'll find what you want at the Temple of Tyr in the City Core upper square west.
Text: 신전 같은 거 찾아? 도시 중심부 북서쪽 광장에 있는 티르 신전에 가면 원하는 걸 찾을 거야.

TextEng: You a spellcaster or something? There's lots of that sort of thing at the Cloaktower, just outside Castle Never.
Text: 주문을 쓰는 부류야? 네버 성 바로 밖에 있는 망토 탑에 그런 것들이 많아.

TextEng: You need a good blade or something? Shining Knight Arms and Armor in the southeast City Core has the best.
Text: 좋은 검이라도 필요해? 도시 중심부 남동쪽에 있는 빛나는 기사 무기점이 최고야.

TextEng: The Moonstone Mask near the Peninsula exit in the City Core west - They have all sorts of interesting things there.
Text: 도시 중심부 서쪽 반도 출구 근처에 월장석 가면 여관이 있어 - 거기에 온갖 흥미로운 것들이 있지.

TextEng: And if you want a sucker to absorb damage for ya, visit the Trade of Blades mercenary enclave in the southwest.
Text: 대신 맞아줄 놈이 필요하면 남서쪽에 있는 용병의 거래소에 가봐.

TextEng: That's where we is now. Got all your basic services as such. Lots of different kinds of people make their home here... Less every day, mind you...
Text: 지금 우리가 있는 곳이야. 기본적인 서비스는 다 있어. 온갖 사람들이 여기 살았지... 물론 날마다 줄어들고 있지만...

TextEng: Castle Never is in the northeast - That's the upper square where all the "informed elite" do their business.
Text: 네버 성은 북동쪽에 있어 - 거기가 '정보통 엘리트'들이 일하는 윗동네야.

TextEng: Beggar's Nest? Don't let anyone sour you on that place - Good honest poor people live and die there. Not like Blacklake or the Docks.
Text: 거지 소굴? 누가 뭐래도 안 좋게 생각하지 마 - 착하고 정직한 가난뱅이들이 거기서 살다 죽어. 검은호수나 부두랑은 달라.

TextEng: I used to do the occasional odd job in Docks district, but not any more. Didn't like working for pirates.
Text: 예전에는 부두 구역에서 가끔 잡일을 했는데, 이젠 안 해. 해적들 밑에서 일하는 건 싫어.

TextEng: Bah! Bunch of stuck up nobles. The Wailing has them tied in knots - Kills them just the same as any commoner, and that fact drives 'em nuts.
Text: 에이! 잘난 척하는 귀족들. 울부짖는 죽음 앞에서 쩔쩔매지 - 평민이랑 똑같이 죽으니까 미쳐 돌아가는 거야.

TextEng: Apparently they're even seizing resources meant for us poorer folk. My brother wouldn't have passed away so easy if he only had a little food in him.
Text: 심지어 우리 같은 가난뱅이 몫 물자를 빼돌린다더라. 형한테 먹을 게 조금만 있었어도 그렇게 쉽게 안 죽었을 텐데.

TextEng: You really don't know the city if you have to ask. Nobody wants to go to the Peninsula. That's where the prison is.
Text: 그것도 물어보면 도시를 정말 모르는 거야. 아무도 반도엔 가고 싶어 하지 않아. 감옥이 있거든.

TextEng: Myself, I usually find what I need around the outer edge. Of course, stock is down all over because of the Wailing.
Text: 나는 주로 외곽에서 필요한 걸 찾아. 물론 역병 때문에 재고가 다 바닥났지만.

TextEng: The prison is usually run pretty strict, but I don't want to imagine what the plague has done to it.
Text: 감옥은 원래 꽤 엄하게 운영되는데, 역병이 그곳에 뭘 했을지 상상하기 싫어.

TextEng: Maybe that was you? Well, I'm glad they got shook up. They deserved it and it quieted things down out there, too.
Text: 혹시 당신이 한 거야? 뭐, 혼쭐이 난 건 잘됐어. 그럴 만했고 덕분에 그쪽도 조용해졌고.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I'm not actually a part of it, so I guess I'm in the clear. Not that I know all that much.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 사실 난 거기 일원이 아니니까 괜찮겠지. 아는 것도 별로 없고.

TextEng: Stay clear of the Docks. Losing your family is worry enough without losing your purse, too. The guards are no help neither.
Text: 부두엔 가지 마. 가족을 잃은 것만 해도 충분한데 지갑까지 잃을 필요 없잖아. 경비병들도 도움 안 돼.

TextEng: See, the Blacklake nobles, and I don't know exactly who, are hoarding food. It's made them a lot of enemies.
Text: 있잖아, 검은호수 귀족들이, 정확히 누군지는 모르겠지만, 음식을 사재기하고 있어. 그래서 적이 많이 생겼지.

TextEng: Last I heard there was rioting because of them. Don't know how it turned out. Not my business. Being the last left of my family, I've got other worries.
Text: 마지막으로 들은 건 그들 때문에 폭동이 났다는 거야. 어떻게 됐는지는 몰라. 내 알 바 아니고. 가족 중 나만 남았으니 다른 걱정이 있거든.

TextEng: Things are a lot better, too. The Wailing's still rough, but someone cleared out some zombies or something that were causing trouble.
Text: 상황이 많이 나아지기도 했어. 역병은 여전히 심하지만, 누군가가 말썽 부리던 좀비들을 처리했거든.

TextEng: I hope none of them zombies were my family - Though if they were, I'd like to thank whoever did the clearing for giving them their due rest...
Text: 그 좀비들 중에 우리 가족이 없었으면 좋겠어 - 있었다면 치워준 사람한테 고맙다 하고 싶어, 편히 쉬게 해줬으니...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Ah, you won't understand anything anyway so I guess it's okay to tell you.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 아, 어차피 아무것도 못 알아들을 테니 말해도 되겠지.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> It's not for me to say. I'm not involved and I don't know much, anyway. Being the last left of my family, I've got other worries.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 내가 말할 일이 아냐. 관련도 없고 아는 것도 별로 없어. 가족 중 나만 남았으니 다른 걱정이 있거든.

TextEng: It's settled down a bit now. I guess there was some killings, and even the captain of the place died.
Text: 지금은 좀 잠잠해졌어. 살인이 좀 있었고, 거기 대장도 죽었다더라.

TextEng: Not my business, but I'm glad they sorted it out. You have something to do with that? Good on you if you did.
Text: 내 일은 아니지만 해결됐다니 다행이야. 당신이 관련 있어? 그랬다면 잘한 거야.

TextEng: I even heard -but I ain't saying from who- that some prisoners and guards have been killed. Wonder what's going on in there...
Text: 심지어 - 누구한테 들었는진 안 말할게 - 죄수랑 경비병 몇 명이 죽었다고 들었어. 거기서 무슨 일이 벌어지는 건지...

TextEng: Now there's even some zombies or something... I hope none of them are my family - I wouldn't want them to have to be like that.
Text: 이젠 좀비 같은 것도 있다고... 우리 가족이 아니었으면 좋겠어 - 그렇게 되는 건 원치 않으니까.

TextEng: A... a cure? There were rumors that one was in the works, but nobody believed us common folk would get it any time soon. W-why do you ask if I would pay for it?
Text: 치... 치료제? 만들고 있다는 소문은 있었지만 우리 평민들이 금방 받을 거라곤 아무도 안 믿었어. 왜... 왜 내가 살 거냐고 물어?

TextEng: Well, just hurry up. I don't have time for these stupid games of yours.
Text: 빨리 말해. 그런 바보 같은 장난에 시간 낭비할 여유 없어.

TextEng: W-what? You... you would rob me in the street in full view of anyone walking by? Are you insane? What about guards? What about watchmen?
Text: 뭐... 뭐? 지나가는 사람들 다 보는 데서 날 털겠다고? 미쳤어? 경비병은? 야경꾼들은?

TextEng: I... I don't understand what you are talking about. Ask your questions and leave me be.
Text: 무... 무슨 소린지 모르겠어. 물을 거 물으면 날 내버려 둬.

TextEng: But... no, please! I... I just want to get through all of this alive! Here... take it! Take all the gold I have! Take it and... and get out of my sight... just go...
Text: 하지만... 안 돼, 제발! 그냥 살아서 버티고 싶을 뿐이야! 여기... 가져가! 금화 다 가져가! 가지고... 눈앞에서 사라져... 그냥 가...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> If it was true, it would be worth everything I have, but I don't believe it. News of that would be everywhere. I... I wish I could believe it.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 사실이라면 가진 거 다 줄 가치가 있겠지만, 안 믿어. 그랬으면 소문이 다 퍼졌을 거야. 믿고 싶지만...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> A cure for the Wailing? You actually have a cure?! Gods! I... I have to have it! Please... please, I'll give you all the gold that I have...
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 울부짖는 죽음 치료제? 정말로 치료제가 있다고?! 신이시여! 꼭... 꼭 가져야 해! 제발... 제발, 가진 금화 전부 줄게...

TextEng: That's everything I have and... and... you are smiling... Why are you... You have no cure... I've been fooled...
Text: 이게 전부야... 근데... 왜 웃어... 왜... 치료제 없잖아... 속았구나...

TextEng: You evil piece of garbage... you took all I had left. Get out of my sight... get out!!
Text: 이 사악한 쓰레기... 남은 거 다 빼앗아 갔어. 눈앞에서 사라져... 꺼져!!

TextEng: Don't you go starting that kind of crap with me. I've already been took for everything I've got. Ask your questions and get lost!
Text: 그런 헛소리 또 시작하지 마. 이미 가진 거 다 털렸어. 물을 거 물으면 꺼져!

TextEng: Leave my sight you evil creature. Leave my sight and never return!
Text: 내 눈앞에서 사라져 이 악마 같은 놈. 사라지고 다시는 돌아오지 마!
